_color empty: 牌组里没有新卡片时的文字颜色
_color: 牌组的数字颜色, header是标题颜色
_description: 描述, 但是修改后不起作用,应该不是这里设置的
_header:
顶部一行的标题和文字样式

Due
_name: 这个不清楚干啥的,应该是用于后台计算的 不要动
_percent: 是否显示百分比, true false
_present: 是否显示该列数据 true false
_条形图: 条形图(今日进度/总进度)里的names决定了里面展示哪些数据

columns._description: Review cards you will see today (and the ones you will not see today)
columns.name: review

columns._note: 今日待复习卡片(今天学习过,但没学完的),单位是时长,意思是还有多久开始复习
columns.description: Cards in learning which are due now
columns.name: learning now

columns._note: 今日的新卡片(今日进度)
columns.description: Unseen cards you will see today (what Anki calls New cards). Neither buried nor suspended.
columns.name: new today

columns._note: 三周内需要复习的卡片
columns.description: Number of reviewed cards with interval at less than 3 weeks
columns.name: young

columns._note: 从没学习过的卡片(总进度)
columns.description: Cards that have never been answered. Neither buried nor suspended.
columns.name: unseen

columns._note: (隐藏)今天学习但没复习的数量
columns.description: Reviews which will happen later, either because a review happened recently, or because the card has many review left.
columns.name: learning later

columns._note: (隐藏)今天学习的新卡片数量
columns.description: Number of reviews done today
columns.name: repeated today

columns._note: (隐藏)今日复习数量/今日重复次数
columns.description: Number of reviewed cards seen today and number of reviews
columns.name: reviewed today/repeated today

columns._note: 柱状图   待复习,学习中,新卡片,和今天复习数量 [names定义进度条里显示的数据]
columns.description: Percent bar to do today
columns.name: bar

columns._note: 柱状图  mature三周内,young三周后,学习中,unseen从未学习,buried跳过的卡片,suspended暂停的卡片 [names定义进度条里显示的数据]
columns.description: Percent bar showing the decks's repartition
columns.name: bar

columns.description: Number of reviews you will see today (new, review and learning)
columns.name: today

columns.description: Cards you'll see today which are not new
columns.name: cards seen today

columns._note: 学习中的卡片(今日进度/总进度)
columns.description: Cards in learning (either new cards you see again, or cards which you have forgotten recently, assuming those cards didn't graduate)
columns.name: learning card

columns.description: Cards in learning which are due now (and in parentheses, the number of reviews which are due later)
columns.name: learning all

columns.description: Review cards which are due today (not counting those in learning)
columns.name: review due

columns._note: 今日复习卡片(今日进度)
columns.description: Review cards you will see today
columns.name: review today

columns._note: 从没学习过的新卡片(总进度)
columns.description: Unseen cards you will see today (what Anki calls New cards), followed by the unseen cards that you will not see today. Neither buried nor suspended.
columns.name: unseen new

columns.description: Number of buried cards (cards you decided not to see today)/Number of suspended cards (cards you will never see unless you unsuspend them in the browser)
columns.name: buried/suspended

columns._note: 不清楚是啥类型的卡片,看单词似乎是删除的? (总进度)
columns.description: Number of buried cards (cards you decided not to see today, or you saw a sibling)
columns.name: buried

columns.description: Number of suspended cards (cards you will never see unless you unsuspend them in the browser)
columns.name: suspended

columns.description: Number of cards/notes in the deck
columns.name: notes/cards

columns.description: Number of cards in the deck
columns.name: cards

columns.description: Number of notes in the deck
columns.name: notes

columns.description: Number of reviewed cards which are not yet due
columns.name: undue

columns._note: 三周后要学习的卡片数(总进度)
columns.description: Number of reviewed cards with interval at least 3 weeks
columns.name: mature

columns._note: 三周内要学习的卡片数(总进度)
columns.description: Number of reviewed cards with interval less than 3 weeks
columns.name: young

columns.description: Number of marked notes
columns.name: marked

columns.description: Number of notes with a leech card
columns.name: leech

columns._note: 今日学习的卡片数量(今日进度)
columns.description: Number of reviewed cards seen today
columns.name: reviewed today

columns.description: Number of times you saw a question from this deck
columns.name: repeated

columns.description: Reviewed cards which are due tomorrow
columns.name: due tomorrow

columns.description: Flags from 0 to 4
columns.name: all flags

columns.description: Flags from 1 to 4
columns.name: flags

columns.description: Flag 1
columns.name: flag 1
